about_the_game:
Politics The Game

It's high time to claw your way to the top!



Politics The Game is the first RPG that lets you become your favorite parliamentarian, create the most powerful party in Poland, and lead it to power!

However, it won't be easy - you must take care of not only your popularity but also your human dignity. Your character can endure a lot, but if they lose self-respect, they will have to step down!

Make use of awesome special powers:
  • Critical attack using a battle cat? Absolutely!
  • German agent curse that reduces the popularity of the attacked? Of course.
  • Evacuating units weakened by fights at the festival using a police Black Hawk? You bet!



  • 15 parliamentarians with different stats and special skills
  • Freedom to create your own political party
  • Unique humor
  • A storyline referring to current events in national politics



Politics The Game has a low entry barrier. The rules can be understood even by a moderately bright left-wing MP, but to achieve perfection at the highest difficulty level, you'll need the strategic genius of Jarosław himself.

Add Politics The Game to your wishlist so you don't miss the release!
